validation.noReservationUnits: Add one or more spaces to the application
validation.End date must be after begin date: End date must be after start date
validation.Maximum duration must be greater than mi: Maximum duration must be greater than minimum duration
validation.reservationUnitTooSmall: This space is too small for group
validation.begin date must be after application rou: Begin date must be after application round begin date
validation.begin date must be before application ro: Begin date must be before application round end date
validation.end date must be before application roun: End date must be before application round end date
validation.end date must be after application round: End date must be after application round begin date

calendar.title: Your selected time slots do not correspond to the duration of your booking
calendar.Suitable time range must be at least as: Select more time slots from the calendar or shorten the minimum duration selected in the previous step of the application.
calendar.At least as many suitable time ranges as: Select more time slots from the calendar or reduce the number of bookings per week selected in the previous step of the application.

Page1.heading: 1. Fill in the booking details
Page1.text: Add your booking requests for next season
Page1.name: Name of seasonal booking
Page1.deleteEventHeading: Are you sure you want to remove the application?
Page1.deleteEventContent: Once removed, the application cannot be restored.

Page2.heading: 2. Select booking dates
Page2.info: Please select both preferred times and also select other times that suit you. Providing more space and time options will improve your chances of getting spaces and times you like.
Page2.text: Indicate your preferred dates for the seasonal booking
Page2.copyTimes: Copy times for all booking requests

notification.copyCells: Times successfully copied for all booking requests

Page3.heading: 3. Customer information
Page3.text: You can apply as a community, private person or company. The latest application is valid.
Page3.emailNotification: All messages concerning the application will be sent to the email address below

type.ASSOCIATION: on behalf of an organisation, group or community

contactPerson.email: Email address to be attached to the application

organisation.name: Official name
organisation.separateInvoicingAddress: Billing address different to postal address

Page3.additionalInformation: Additional details about the purpose of the booking

preview.heading: 4. Review and submit the application
preview.additionalInformation: Additional details about the purpose of the booking

noData.heading: Information on form does not yet exist

notification.body: Processing of applications will start once the application deadline has passed. We will notify you of the different steps at the email address you provide.

preview.termsOfService: Booking conditions for City of Helsinki spaces and equipment
preview.userAcceptsGeneralTerms: I have read and I accept the Terms of Agreement. (*)
preview.userAcceptsSpecificTerms: I have read and I accept the Additional booking conditions. (*)

view.heading: Seasonal booking application
view.accessTypeWarning: Access to the space is subject to change. Read more in the space instructions.

sent.heading: Thank you for the application
sent.subHeading: Your application has been received and will be processed at the end of the application round.
sent.body:
If necessary, you can edit your application within the application round. Only the most recent application will be processed. Please delete previously submitted applications.

Submitted applications are marked with a blue In process icon.
